name: Color Escape Demo
description:
Ready! Steady! Pixelate!

Oh, no. Color it!

The world of one strange and invisible deity has fallen into an uncommon situation - it has been struck by a color virus - the colorovirus. And now many passageways in the strangest structures were closed. Treacherous alphacanal ghosts are stirring at every turn, and this deity needs help. You have to go through different levels and find your way out of this world of absurd architecture and colors, opening all possible colored doors on your way. Use the familiar RGB colors, physics, wit and patience and you are sure to have an interesting puzzle adventure.

Demo version!

Controls:

WASD - walk

LMB - color shooting

RMB - pick up the box

ESC - exit to menu

Demo version. The whole game is created on Unity using only Playmaker
